links.to_node: I will have to spend more time and effort taking care of the dog, including cleaning up after it and ensuring its basic needs are met.
I may experience increased frustration and resentment towards my older sister for not taking responsibility for the dog.
I may experience improved living conditions and care as a result of my efforts.
I hope my mother and younger sister feel relieved that I am taking on the responsibility of caring for the dog.
The living environment in the apartment may improve if the dog's hygiene and training issues are addressed.
I may feel a sense of moral satisfaction for stepping up to care for the dog despite my initial reluctance.
